document_data.name: ''Door of negation''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''door of negation''''' was a type of ''[[dweomered door]]'' that would temporarily nullify any [[spell]] and spell-like effects of magical items that passed through its threshold. These doors had no effect on [[artifact]]s.
document_data.Creation: ''Doors of negation'' were created with use of the ''[[greater dispel magic]]'' spell.
